IR.defaultVolumeHint: This is the default volume set for the sound effects (sfx). This can be customised when setting up the sfx folder for the selected entity. '1' is 100% (the default). Be careful with higher numbers as those could cause problems like audio artifacts or clipping.
IR.error-missingSoundFile: No sound file provided. The file needs to be of type OGG; MP3; FLAC; WEBM or WAV.
IR.error-missingFolderPath: No folder path provided. The folder path needs to be relative to the data folder; i.e. 'assets/sounds/book_open'.
